item.title: Aspose.CAD for Python 22.2 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.CAD for Python 22.2. Please welcome our brand new product, Aspose.CAD for Python 22.2! Aspose.CAD for Python is the unique solution on the market that makes possible exporting reports and operate CAD and BIM drawing files from Python to various image file formats. The export formats currently include: PDF, WMF, SVG, EMF, BMP, GIF, JPG, JPEG, DICOM, WEBP, JP2, JPEG2000, PNG, TIFF, PSD, HTML5.
